pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Undo translate, rotate, snap and align

content.raw:
I think with this change, real time inspector updates when moving models will no longer work? The values are now updated only on mouse release. 

The inspector also doesn't display the scale updates after mouse release. So when you press cancel or ok, the scale of the visual/collision reverts back to the state when the inspector was opened.
content.html:
I think with this change, real time inspector updates when moving models will no longer work? The values are now updated only on mouse release.

The inspector also doesn't display the scale updates after mouse release. So when you press cancel or ok, the scale of the visual/collision reverts back to the state when the inspector was opened.
